text: The 1929 Tour de Hongrie was the fourth edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 27 to 30 June 1929. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Oskar Thierbach. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1929 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 27 June | Budapest to Miskolc | | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text-align:right;" | 28 June | Miskolc to Miskolc | | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 29 June | Miskolc to Gyöngyös | | |- ! scope="col" | 4 | style="text-align:right;" | 30 June | Balassagyarmat to Budapest | | |- | colspan="3" style="text- align:center" | Total | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | Germany | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Postás | style="text-align:right;" | + 14' 20" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | UTE | style="text-align:right;" | + 15' 40" |} |} ==References== 1929 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
title: 1929 Tour de Hongrie
